europeana:record.dc:title: Trichoptera Newsletter 2 (1976)
europeana:record.dc:creator: Anonym , Crichton M. Ian, Flint Oliver, Malicky Hans, Marshall Jane, Morse John, Nimmo Andrew P., Scott Katherine Marjorie F., Wiggins Glenn B.
europeana:record.dc:description: Inhaltsverzeichnis: Hans Malicky: Dear Trichopterologist... 1- 2. M. Ian Crichton: 2nd International Symposium on Trichoptera 2. John Morse, Oliver Flint: Informal Meeting of Trichoptera Workers Smith Mountain Lake, Virginia, U.S.A. August 28-30, 1976 3- 4. Katherine Marjorie F. Scott: Trichoptera Larvae and Pupae 4. Andrew P. Nimmo: First and future Informal field meetings of aquatic entomologists of northwest North America 5- 6. Glenn B. Wiggins: Hagenella Clathrata (Kol.) (Phryganeidae) 6. Hans Malicky: Where is Krüper's material from Greece? 7. Jane Marshall: Where is the collection of Fritz Müller? 7. Jane Marshall: What is Hydroptila occulta? 8. Hans Malicky: Identification book for European Trichoptera 8. Anonym: List of research workers on Trichoptera (Continued from No. 1) 9- 23
